actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to clarify the authority of servicemembers who incur a catastrophic injury or illness while in military service to terminate leases of premises and motor vehicles, and for other purposes.
short_title: Leasing Relief for Dependents of Fallen Heroes and Injured Servicemembers Act of 2020

summary.text:
Leasing Relief for Dependents of Fallen Heroes and Injured Servicemembers Act of 2020

This bill allows an adult dependent or certain other specified representatives of a service member who was killed or catastrophically injured in military service to terminate the service member's lease of a premises or of a motor vehicle without financial penalty.
